links.title: OPEC 'powerless to prevent' oil prices jumping toward $100 a barrel this year
links.description: Askin Kiyagan | Anadolu Agency | Getty Images OPEC kingpin Saudi Arabia is ill-equipped to prevent a supply shock in the energy market, analysts told CNBC on Monday, as oil traders prepare for the possibility of $100 a barrel before year-end.

links.title: Apple silent amid iPhone 'chargegate' complaints
links.description: Apple has remained silent amid complaints that its new iPhone XS and XS Max smartphones fail to charge consistently when plugged in. Several users have reported that their device refuses to charge if it has been idle for a while. Some charge only if the display is "woken up".
